story.title: A Storm to Remember
story.text: Lightning split the sky—CRACK! Deep in the Grandmaster’s Chess Museum, something… woke up.
Ancient chess computers flickered to life. Their screens glowed. Their circuits hummed. They remembered every game…
The chessboard trembled. Pieces moved on their own. This wasn’t just a game anymore…
The museum doors slammed shut. Only one way out… Win. Or stay forever.
